caption: This meditation song features a melody played on a flute. The tone of the flute is tremulous. This is accompanied by a Veena playing a repetitive melody. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this song. The mood of this song is relaxing and calming. This song can be played in a meditation center.
